data.name: NYC SUG Monthly meetups 2019
data.description:
- - - -
6:00 - Arrivals and networking / 6:30 - Group exercise The NYC Scrum User Group meets monthly to talk about Scrum, to share experiences, to network, and to provide support for local Scrum practitioners. Interested in telling your own story? If you have an idea you would like to share, come…
